Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [lift off the road and turn left. go to the golden windows on the building. fly up over the building and go forward one block. turn left and go around the left side of the dark tall building. go straight to the end of the road. turn around and fly behind the golden windowed building. go straight towards the tall tan building. continue straight towards the water. stop one block away from the water. turn left. fly to the left of the tall sky scraper. fly forward to the next road ahead. stop near the billboard on the roof across the road and lower down a bit.]. At the initial position, you are asked to follow a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I fly to the front of a tall skyscraper.  
B. I go straight to the tall brown building.  
C. I turn left and go around the left side of the dark tall building.  
D. I turn left.  
E. I go straight to the water.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: D; Reason: The current view shows a perspective that aligns with the instruction to "turn left" after stopping near the billboard on the roof across the road. The agent appears to be in a position to execute this turn, as indicated by the alignment of the buildings and streets in the frame.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(1:43, 1:59)]
Option: E
Reason: The navigation instructions state: "turn left and go around the left side of the dark tall building. go straight to the end of the road."
From 0:46 to 1:43, the agent turns left and goes around the left side of the dark tall building.
From 1:43 to the end of the video at 1:59, the agent is clearly moving straight forward, following the instruction "go straight to the end of the road." The view shows the agent moving past the dark tall building, continuing in a straight line.

The provided answer states Option D ("I turn left") and gives a reason related to a much later instruction ("turn left" after "stopping near the billboard on the roof across the road"). This is incorrect because:
1.  The agent is not turning left in the current segment (1:43-1:59); it is moving straight.
2.  The instruction to "turn left" (Option D) was executed earlier in the video (around 0:46).
3.  The instructions about stopping near a billboard and then turning left are much further down the instruction list and are not reached within this video segment.
